resources.string: Extraordinary cocktails - all night! Nonetheless, at Blume the music profile aims toward an original, and sustainable vibe provided by the everlasting genres of disco, funk and electronic music. Sooooooo.. Stop by, and make sure to wear shoes suitable for dancing, you will need them!

Step through the entrance to the enchanted land of Blume and experience a party that will keep you bedazzled all night long. High level innovative cocktails and extraordinary service, combined with intimate surroundings and a distinct music profile will ensure the remarkable party. Come and join us!
